sections.title: Introduction for the Video
content: In the year 2024, a young woman receives a mysterious camcorder from the future.
As she powers it on, she is shocked to see a recording of her own murder, a chilling scene from 2035.
The only clue she has is the voice from the recording, urging her to make a phone call—a call that connects her to the killer’s number.

sections.title: Storyboard
content: For my project, I am focusing on the paradox that in my film time is not a linear existence.
How does future, present, and past exist?
The film explores how the future, present, and past coexist simultaneously.

sections.title: Development
content: During the editing process, I decided to continue the 'still image series' from 'City as System' Project.
It gradually turned into this final story version rather than the very initial idea.

concept.title: Concept
poemSections: If time is no longer linear
This was how I started developing ideas
from the City as System project:
